      • getMessages

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getMessages(java.util.EnumSet<com.testingtech.ttworkbench.ttman.parameters.validation.ErrorKind> theMessageKinds)
        Fetches all messages on this panel of specified error kind.
        Parameters:
        theMessageKinds - Set of error kinds considered in the result.
        Returns:
        a list of messages compiled out of messages matches the specified error kinds.
